Create Project

Use the Create Project dialog box (File | Create Project) to create a Serena ChangeMan Version Manager project.

Field Descriptions

Name Enter a name for the project. No two projects at the same level in the project database can have the same name. The name cannot begin or end with a tab or blank space. Any character can be used in the name except an asterisk (*), a colon (:), a vertical bar (|), forward and backward slashes (/\), a question mark (?), and angle brackets (< >). No project name can be the two character name of .. or the one character name of . or @.
Workfile Location Either enter the workfile location for the project or click the Browse button to select the location.
